title: Kitsilano School App
summary: School App of Kitsilano Secondary School
description: The Kitsilano School App is an Android phone application developed by the Kitsilano App Club. As a student hobby club, the Kits App Club has been working on this application since October 2013. We will continue to update, improve, and expand our App to better serve the student body at Kitsilano Secondary School. We welcome any ideas and suggestions. Current functionality of this application includes - Countdown to the next bell- Day1/Day2 calendar- Automatic mute device during school hours option- Class schedule- Homework reminder- Android Wear notification- School announcement
descriptionHTML:
The Kitsilano School App is an Android phone application developed by the Kitsilano App Club. As a student hobby club, the Kits App Club has been working on this application since October 2013. We will continue to update, improve, and expand our App to better serve the student body at Kitsilano Secondary School. We welcome any ideas and suggestions.

Current functionality of this application includes
- Countdown to the next bell
- Day1/Day2 calendar
- Automatic mute device during school hours option
- Class schedule
- Homework reminder
- Android Wear notification
- School announcement
comments: Still buggy but easy to fix the school needs to get its priorities straight and concentrate on improving this app instead of making a new one.
Widgets don't really work some glitches. There are better apps of you can live without announcements
A great app helps with school a lot good job app team I think that's who made it but anyways good job ðŸ‘Œ
